alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier and southwestern Hendry Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Immokalee, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Immokalee, Felda, Big Corkscrew Island, Orangetree, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Bunker Hill and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
